musicPlayer.shortDesc: A music player app for easy music listening.
musicPlayer.fullDesc:
This music player app supports local music list storage for offline playback, with multi-condition filtering by artist, genre, and name.

Built to solve common issues like lack of filtering in existing apps and playback interruptions from unstable networks.

Tech stack: Expo framework, SQLite local database, Node.js + Express.js backend for backups. Future plans include Google Drive integration for enhanced user experience.

visualStreaming.fullDesc:
This simple 2D face swap app lets users replace their face with another's. Originally planned for real-time streaming, but due to mobile/PC performance limits, implemented using traditional math formulas.

Tech stack: React Native framework with Kotlin, Objective-C, C++ native modules and OpenCV for face swap logic.

aiChatApp.fullDesc:
This AI chat app, built for learning AI, allows multiple chat rooms, conversation memory retention, and history deletion.

Tech stack: Expo framework integrated with GitHub Models for AI conversations.

optimizationLoadingSpeed.title: Optimization loading speed
optimizationLoadingSpeed.shortDesc: Reduced page load time from 10+ seconds to under 1 second.
optimizationLoadingSpeed.fullDesc:
Login performance optimization case from a work project. Key issues:

• State reset twice during login, causing duplicate API calls and full re-renders;
• Outdated Redux version making `useQuery`'s `selectFromResult` re-render constantly.

Used React DevTools to track renders and Flipper to monitor state changes for precise diagnosis. Fix resolved bottleneck and significantly improved app speed.
